data.text:
Stay up-to-date with the latest news and weather in DC, Maryland and Virginia on the all-new free WUSA9 app.

Our app features the latest breaking news that impacts you and your family, interactive weather and radar, and live video from our newscasts and local events.

LOCAL & BREAKING NEWS

â¢ Receive real-time notifications for breaking news

â¢ Read the latest news as it happens in your area

â¢ Explore exclusive investigative stories

â¢ Browse photos, news clips, and raw video

LOCAL WEATHER

â¢ Daily and hourly forecasts for your city

â¢ The latest forecasts from our meteorologists

â¢ Interactive radar maps

â¢ Automated hyperlocal severe weather alerts

LIVE VIDEO

â¢ Watch live video newscasts and breaking news from WUSA9

PERSONALIZATION

â¢ Discover and dive into topics that matter to you

â¢ Favorite topics to receive personalized updates

Other Features:

â¢ Share stories & videos directly with your friends and family

â¢ See the latest updates and behind the scenes photos from your favorite anchors and reporters

â¢ Get information on school delays & closings as they happen

â¢ Cast videos and livestreams directly to your TV or streaming device, so you can lean back and enjoy your favorite programming on your biggest screen.

This is the official app of WUSA and WUSA9.com, the CBS affiliate serving Virginia, Maryland and Washington, D.C.

Got feedback? Let us know how we can make this the best app experience for you! Send us a note at appfeedback@tegna.com.

Privacy Policy: https://www.wusa9.com/privacy

Do Not Sell My Information: https://www.wusa9.com/do-not-sell-my-information

Terms of Service: https://www.wusa9.com/terms

NYC BDBx ,

Refreshing News

Channel 9 continues to remain on point. At times it also makes me laugh or smile during the Wake up DC show. I also like the refreshing and relevant âVerifyâ segment that clarifies facts from fiction or just right out right false information to the Washington Metro people. As COVID-19 pandemic tests our patience, faith and daily ability to coop regardless of society. I also like how you also celebrate the heroes amongst us. We need to celebrate each others efforts during these time to give our communities hope and to make caring for each other contagious in good way. Itâs refreshing to hear and see a diverse reporter team that has each otherâs back and enjoys their jobs. Thanks for standing out, and being industry leaders as a News Organization. Continue to set the bar high so other news organizations follow your lead and represents our country. You Rock!!!!!

19pastor39 ,

Rev. David Benway

The very first AP that I added to my smart phone was WUSA9. I am hoping this new one will be as informative and easy to use as the old one. I want my news weather and sports for DC, Maryland, and Virginia. I will get my world news from this same site. Make me real happy and keep it simple.I have been watching W U S A News and weather since I moved here over 25 years ago yes i remember Bruce when we were both young and so many of the team. I also get my weather from Topper and his team, I gave up on the others because I demanded accurate reports and sympathize wit Topper when thereâs no snow. Iâm an old Vermonter and we always had snow. I will pray with you topper. I will always stick with the best. Rev. David Benway
